title: Drawing, "Death of Flaminius in the Battle of Trasimeno; Annabelle Loses an Eye in the Swamps of Fiano, Tuscany"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: morte di C Flaminio Console  alla bataglia del Trasimeno; Anibale perde un occio nelle paludi di Fiana in Toscana
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Death of Flaminius in the Battle of Trasimeno; Annabelle Loses an Eye in the Swamps of Fiano, Tuscany".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1361.
